panels.content:
Setup



Inverter a Solis 5K-G Single Phase Inverter
18 Panels (unkown brand), total 5220wp, orientation west
LAN log stick connected to the inverter is logging to the GinLong cloud. Data is then scraped every 5 minutes from json pages and imported in influxdb via a custom made python script.

targets.query: SELECT mean("G") FROM "p1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("ac_output_amps_1"), sum("ac_output_amps_2"), sum("ac_output_amps_3") FROM "PV" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(none)
SELECT mean("G") FROM "p1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
